General.Name: Yujin Robot Co. Ltd
General.Description: Yujin Robot Co., Ltd. researches, develops, and supplies various service robots in Korea. The company offers autonomous mobility solution, vacuum cleaning robot, and smart assembly system. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Incheon, South Korea.
